p.s: This abridged blog entry, made by Ankita Mitra on the 5th February 2014, is about the problem of environmental pollution and it causes and effects.
The author underlines, that the pollution has big and devastating effects on the earth.
Animals, plants and humanity will be in danger.
Due to the environmental pollution many plants and animals will get extinct and the earth will have to face enormous health problems.
The pollution is caused by nuclear tests and the industry, but car, treffictraffic, synthetic detergents and contaminating plants are cause too.
